class.name: TimeoutException
class.javadoc:
Exception thrown when a blocking operation times out. Blocking operations for which a timeout is specified need a means to indicate that the timeout has occurred. For many such operations it is possible to return a value that indicates timeout; when that is not possible or desirable then <tt>TimeoutException</tt> should be declared and thrown.
1.5
Doug Lea
Constructs a <tt>TimeoutException</tt> with no specified detail message.

Constructs a <tt>TimeoutException</tt> with the specified detail message.
message the detail message
